description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Battle Cubes is a fast paced, action packed, multiplayer first person shooter that combines the best features from classic and modern games. Play on Xbox Live with 16 of your friends or 31 via System Link! Play with up to 4 players splitscreen (Local, System Link, and on Xbox Live). You can customize your cuboid with hats! Includes CO-OP and Competitive game modes including Survival mode!
